description: Try our easy to follow Prawn & Corn Packs With Pawpaw Salsa recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Prawn & Corn Packs With Pawpaw Salsa Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220Â°C. Cut 4 x 30cm pieces of foil. Set aside.
Cook corn in a large saucepan of boiling water for 10 minutes. Drain.
Meanwhile, combine Cajun seasoning, garlic, lemon juice, coriander and butter in a large bowl. Add corn, prawns and tomatoes. Toss gently to combine.

Divide mixture evenly among foil pieces. Fold to enclose filling and seal edges. Transfer to a baking tray. Bake for 15 minutes. Open parcels, return to oven and bake for a further 5 minutes or until prawns are cooked through.
Meanwhile, to make the salsa, combine all the ingredients in a small bowl. Open parcels and top with salsa and extra coriander to serve.
